column1: Title  : M810501 - Life Expectancy By Sex, Annual
Total Life Expectancy At Age 65 Years (Residents)
Male Life Expectancy At Age 65 Years (Residents)
Female Life Expectancy At Age 65 Years (Residents)
Refer to Singapore residents (citizens and permanent residents) from 1980.  Prior to 1980, figures refer to total population.  Data for the latest available year is preliminary.
